description: The solicitation is for Security Guard Services.
full_summary:
# Security and Compliance Services – Pacific Rim National Park Reserve Parks Canada

## Tender Information

- **Tender Reference Number**: CB-4635-36775663
- **Solicitation Number**: 5P420-22-0055/A
- **Publication Date**: April 5, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: April 18, 2023 4:00 PM
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 15, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

## Tender Status

This tender has expired.

## Description

The tender was initially published to solicit Security and Compliance Services for the Pacific Rim National Park Reserve for Parks Canada.

**Update**: Amendment 2 was made to extend the tender closing date to April 18, 2023 and to provide responses to bidder questions.

**Original Notice**:  The original tender notice was published on April 5, 2023, and is available here: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-23-01028126

**Description**: The solicitation requires a security service provider to provide security and compliance services for the Pacific Rim National Park Reserve.

## Contracting Entity

Parks Canada contracts the security service provider.

---

## Location

This tender opportunity is for a located in British Columbia and Canada.

## Goods and Services

The following Goods and Services categories are applicable for this tender:

- **UNSPSC Category**: 92121504 Security guard services (english)
- **UNSPSC Category (French)**: *Services de gardiennage* (francais)
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other applicable trade agreements.

## Selection Criteria

- **Weighting**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Addressed (refer to KidShield datasheet)

---

## Contact Information
If you need a copy of the tender, please contact:
[ Amy Barrett Lichter ](mailto:amy.barrettlichter@pc.gc.ca), via email or
(403) 589-3402 by phone.
Contact Derek Stuart, via email at: derek.stuart@alln-i.ca or call (902) 542-2617, fax (902) 542-2622.

---

## Files Attached to the Tender

Some files are attached to the tender, find them here:
https://canadabuys.canada
